translation.ja: クロアチアは初めてか
ええ ここは古都だ

translation.en: Uh, in case you need a taxi while you're here.

translation.ja: ありがとう ゼイン
楽しんで 待って　お金を払う

translation.en: Uh, it's been taken care of.
Oh, well, at least let me tip you then.
Aw, it's so good to see you.
I can't believe we're finally here. We're doing this.
I know. Come on. I've been waiting to open the duty-free.
translation.ja: そうね　免税店に行くわよ

translation.en: Yeah. Oh, you waited. That's a first.
Thanks for paying for the taxi.
Thank Jay. It's all on him.
translation.ja: ジェイが出してくれた
すごい ケイト 信じられない

translation.en: Can we move in? Stay forever?
Never going home. Think Rob would notice?
translation.ja: 帰らないとロブにバレる？
そうね　でも別にいい

translation.en: -I think I forgot. -Well, you'll just have to go naked.
translation.ja: 忘れた じゃあ裸で

translation.en: -You didn't have to get me anything. -I wanted to, though.
translation.ja: 悪いわ ほんの気持ちよ

translation.en: I just wanted to say thank you for planning this whole thing.
translation.ja: 計画を立ててくれたお礼ね

translation.en: And I've… I've really missed you so much.

translation.ja: きれいね ベス　ありがとう

translation.en: [Beth] Here. I know you love black onyx.
translation.ja: ケイトはブラックオニキスが 好きでしょ
返品する いいえ　すてきよ

translation.en: I don't know what to wear. Nothing fancy enough.
translation.ja: どれを着てもパッとしない

translation.en: [Rob] So just go in your granny panties. You'll still look great.
translation.ja: 君はデカパンでもセクシーだ

translation.en: I'm so tired. I just want to go to bed.
translation.ja: 疲れたから もう寝たい

translation.en: So go to bed. It's your holiday too.
No, no. Kate booked a restaurant. It'll be fun.
translation.ja: ダメよ ケイトが レストランを予約してくれた

translation.en: She misses your boobs, she says.
translation.ja: 君のおっぱいを恋しがってる

translation.en: [laughs] What do you think? New dress.
translation.ja: どう？　新しいドレスよ

translation.en: I went on the post-breakup shopping spree to end all shopping sprees.
translation.ja: 彼と別れたあとに ヤケ買いした服なの

translation.en: Oh, hey, Rob. How's it going?
translation.ja: あら ロブ　調子は？

translation.en: Oh, is that my gorgeous goddaughter?
-Give her a kiss from me. -[Rob] I will.
I've got to put her down actually. You guys have a good night.
translation.ja: もう寝かしつけの時間だ おやすみ
飲みすぎるな ムリよ
ええ さすがに多い
おやすみ　愛してる

translation.en: -I'll call you tomorrow. Bye. -Have a good time. Love you.
translation.ja: また明日 楽しんで　愛してる

translation.en: Ah, if I break my neck in these things, it's your fault.
translation.ja: 首の骨を折ったら ケイトのせいね

translation.en: You look like a supermodel. You should keep them.
translation.ja: あなたはスーパーモデルよ

translation.en: -Have you settled in okay? -Yeah. Hi, I'm Beth.
translation.ja: 泊まり心地は？ いいわ　私はベス

translation.en: -It's nice to meet you. -[car horn honks] Everything's great.
translation.ja: よろしく　すてきな家ね

translation.en: [Kate] Do you know what you want?
[Beth] I don't know, but I need to eat soon.
translation.ja: 早く出てくるものがいい

translation.en: I keep telling you it's on Jay.
translation.ja: ジェイのお金だってば

translation.en: He still hasn't taken me off his credit card.
translation.ja: まだ彼のカードがある

translation.en: I intend on discovering what the limit is before he notices.
translation.ja: 限度額まで使ってやるわ

translation.en: With any luck, he'll have an aneurysm and drop dead on top of his assistant.
translation.ja: 動脈破裂で ポックリ逝けばいい 奴の助手の上でね

translation.en: Uh, we'll start with a dozen raw oysters and a bottle of champagne.
translation.ja: まずは生ガキ１皿と シャンパン１本

translation.en: -The most expensive one on the menu. -[chuckles] Excellent.
translation.ja: お店で一番高いものを かしこまりました

translation.en: I should've been there for you.
translation.ja: あなたのそばに いられなくて

translation.en: You had a baby. You're forgiven.
translation.ja: 妊娠したから仕方ない

translation.en: I'm fine. Couldn't care less about Jay.
translation.ja: ジェイなんて どうでもいい

translation.en: -And what about polyamory, girl? Ooh! -Polyamory, huh?
translation.ja: 複数恋愛ってどう思う？ 複数恋愛？

translation.en: -[cork pops] -I can barely manage one relationship.
Anyway, enough about me. How about you?
translation.ja: ところで 最近どんな感じ？

translation.en: Mmm, and what about with you?
Are you getting any at least?
Isn't it about time you got back on the horse?
translation.ja: 思い切ってナンパしない？

translation.en: I… I just don't feel like it.
translation.ja: そんな気分になれない

translation.en: -Is he not doing it for you anymore? -[Beth] It's not Rob.

translation.ja: 彼と別れたら？ 何て？

translation.en: If you're not happy, take it from me, divorce is the answer.
translation.ja: 幸せじゃないなら 離婚したほうがいい

translation.en: Especially when it comes with a big fat alimony paycheck.
translation.ja: 特に高い慰謝料が もらえるならね
前も そう言ってた
ありがとう お構いなく

translation.en: Shut up. Go away. Go away.
translation.ja: 黙って　さっさと失せて

translation.en: I'm afraid the card was rejected.
translation.ja: このカードは 使えませんでした
すごい 電話しないで

translation.en: -Jay. -Did he find out about the card?
translation.ja: ジェイよ カードがバレた？

translation.en: Yeah. Turns out I did discover the limit.
translation.ja: ええ 限度額に来ちゃったわ

translation.en: Do you want me to go halves?
-You get the drinks at the next place. -[Beth] Kate, I'm so sorry. I'm tired.
translation.ja: 次でおごって ごめん　疲れちゃった

translation.en: -And my boobs are like gonna explode. -[Kate] No, no, no.
translation.ja: おっぱいが爆発しそう

translation.en: I have to pump. They're full, and I can't.
translation.ja: 搾乳しないとパンパン

translation.en: -And we have the bike tour tomorrow. -Oh, yeah, the bike tour.
translation.ja: 明日もある そうね　自転車ツアーだわ
学生の頃に戻ったつもりで

translation.en: It took me months to convince you to come away.
translation.ja: 数ヵ月越しで会えたのよ

translation.en: Who knows when we're going to do it again.
translation.ja: 次はいつか分からない

translation.en: The entrance is just around there.
translation.ja: 入り口は あの辺りだ

translation.en: Oh, wait, wait, wait. I just want to fix my face and powder my nose.
translation.ja: 待って 鼻にパウダーを塗り直す

translation.en: California originally, but I've lived in London the last 15 years.
translation.ja: カリフォルニア出身だけど 15年前から ロンドンに住んでる

translation.en: You left Syria because of the war.
translation.ja: あなたは内戦を 逃れてきたのね

translation.en: No, not, not very well. Um, just a little bit.
translation.ja: あまり上手くないけど 少しだけね

translation.en: I work with the Global Rescue Initiative, or I used to.
translation.ja: 以前 ＧＲＩという 人道支援団体で働いてた

translation.en: -No, no, you get the next round. -[bartender] What can I get you?
translation.ja: いいえ　次でお願い

translation.en: Oh my God, look over there. Hot.
translation.ja: あっちを見て　セクシーよ

translation.en: -[bartender] Here you go. -We should go over there.
translation.ja: お待たせしました 行きましょ

translation.en: -Mind if we join you? -No, I'm sure they're waiting for someone.
translation.ja: 座っても？ やめましょ　誰か来そうだわ

translation.en: No, no, please, be our guests.
translation.ja: 遠慮しないで　座って

translation.en: I don't think I've seen you here before.
[man 2] I love your dress. You look like a disco ball.
translation.ja: ミラーボールみたいな ドレスだ

translation.en: You want to see pictures of my baby?
When was the last time you got hit on by someone that hot?
translation.ja: 最後に口説かれたのは？

translation.en: Come on, we were just saying you need to get back on the horse.
translation.ja: ナンパしようって 話したわよね

translation.en: [Kate] So? Rob doesn't have to find out.
One night of excitement might bring you out of your rut.
translation.ja: 熱い一夜を過ごせば マンネリを脱却できるかもよ

translation.en: We were just saying how you should come back to ours.
translation.ja: あなたたちと話したいと 思ってた

translation.en: [on voicemail] Hi, you've got Kate, or maybe you haven't, so leave a message.
translation.ja: ケイトよ　留守電に メッセージを残してね

translation.en: [Beth] Hey, did you get my text?

translation.ja: 何？ すごく心配なの

translation.en: It's already noon, and Kate hasn't come home.
translation.ja: 正午なのに ケイトが戻らない

translation.en: So she's probably gone for a coffee or a wander or something.
translation.ja: コーヒーでも 買ってるんだろう
夕べは楽しかった？ ええ

translation.en: I did. I drank a bit much.
Honestly, I can barely remember anything.
translation.ja: 正直 ほとんど記憶がない

translation.en: Right. And what are you doing today?
translation.ja: そうか 今日は何する？

translation.en: We're meant to be doing a bike tour.
There you go. That's why she's vanished. Should've told her it was a shopping tour.
translation.ja: だから姿を消した 買い物がいいんだろ

translation.en: She… She didn't leave a note, and she hasn't texted either.
translation.ja: メモ書きもメールも 残されてない
なら彼女を待たなくて いいだろ
また話そう 分かった

translation.en: -I'll let you know if I hear. Love you. -[Rob] Bye.
translation.ja: また連絡する じゃあ

translation.en: I'm sorry to bother you. Uh…
I'm looking for her. Um, Kate.
I think she went out, and I can't get a hold of her.
You haven't seen her, have you?

translation.ja: 分かった ありがとう

translation.en: You're not allowed to have parties. It says so very clearly in the rules.
translation.ja: パーティーは禁止だ 規則に明記されてる

translation.en: And I have to charge you for the two extra guests that stayed over.
translation.ja: 夕べの２人分の宿泊費を 追加請求させてもらう

translation.en: [officer] What was the name of the bar?
translation.ja: 〝スプリト観光警察署〞 バーの名前は？
〝スプリト観光警察署〞 覚えてない 〝スプリト観光警察署〞

translation.en: [officer] Okay, let me see her photo.
translation.ja: 〝スプリト観光警察署〞 彼女の写真を見せて 彼女の写真を見せて

translation.en: So you brought two men back to your apartment.
translation.ja: 男２人を家に連れ込んで―

translation.en: -And you don't remember their names. -[Beth] Well…
translation.ja: 名前も覚えてないのか

translation.en: -Had you been drinking? -[chuckles] Yeah, a little.
translation.ja: 酔ってた？ ええ 少しね

translation.en: More than a little if you don't remember anything.
translation.ja: 何も覚えてないほど 飲んだのか

translation.en: I'm… I'm just not used to drinking, that's all.
I… I just had a baby. So…
translation.ja: 赤ちゃんが 生まれたばかりだから…

translation.en: Okay, your friend probably go out clubbing or to a bar.
translation.ja: 君の友達はクラブか バーにでも行ったんだろ
いえ 同じ家に泊まってる

translation.en: So we're supposed to be doing things, sightseeing and…
translation.ja: これから一緒に 観光する予定なのに…

translation.en: Did you check the hospitals? Maybe she had an accident.
translation.ja: 病院を調べた？ 事故かもしれない

translation.en: Yeah. I did, but there's no record of her being admitted.
translation.ja: ええ でも 入院記録はなかった

translation.en: [scoffs] Her friend ditched her for some guy, and she's upset.
translation.ja: 〈友人に男を優先されて 怒ってる〉

translation.en: [in English] Does she have her bag with her? Her wallet, her passport, keys?
translation.ja: 彼女の財布や パスポートや鍵は？

translation.en: [in English] Can I file a missing persons report?
No, you can't because you need to wait 24 hours.
translation.ja: いや 出せるのは 24時間経ってからだ

translation.en: Most people show up before then.
translation.ja: 大体それまでに見つかる

translation.en: I'm sure your friend will too.
-Thanks for picking me up. -It was close by. It's no bother.
translation.ja: ありがとう たまたま近くにいたんだ

translation.en: [sighs] I couldn't remember the name of the bar last night.
-You want me to come in with you? -No.
translation.ja: 一緒に行こうか？ いいえ

translation.en: We were sitting right there with two guys.
translation.ja: 私たちは ２人の男性と座ってた

translation.en: She was wearing a blue dress.
Figured you could use some help.
translation.ja: 助けが要ると思ってね

translation.en: [scoffs] I didn't know that was an actual, real thing?
translation.ja: そんなの本当にあったの？
君の友達が雇ったとか

translation.en: No, she didn't hire them either.
might bring you out of your rut.
translation.ja: マンネリを脱却できるかも

translation.en: She kept going on and on about how I needed to have some fun.
translation.ja: 私はケイトに 火遊びさせられてたんだわ

translation.en: I wondered why he was into me.
The barman says he's seen them there a lot.
translation.ja: バーテンダーが言ってた
毎回違う女が相手だと

translation.en: [sighs] Does he know how to get a hold of them?
Uh, he only knew their first names.
translation.ja: 名前しか分からないらしい

translation.en: Come on. I'll take you back.
[Rob on phone] You went to the police?
I mean, this is Kate we're talking about. She's not exactly reliable.
translation.ja: 何ていうか ケイトは信頼できない

translation.en: [Beth] No, no, she wouldn't do this to me. Leave without telling me?
translation.ja: 彼女は何も言わず 出て行ったりしないわ

translation.en: How many times on a night out did she ditch you for a bloke she just met?
translation.ja: 君より男を優先させて ばかりだった

translation.en: [Beth] No, I've left her dozens of messages.
translation.ja: 何十通もメールしたわ
何かあったのよ まさか

translation.en: I've got some brilliant pictures to show you of Aster by the way.
translation.ja: そうだ アスターの 超いい写真が撮れた

translation.en: Earlier on, we were watching The Godfather, and it turns out
translation.ja: 「ゴッドファーザー」を ２人で見て

translation.en: she really likes the part where they find the horse's head in the bed.
translation.ja: ベッドにあった馬の首の シーンに釘付け

translation.en: Well, we're seeing you tomorrow. Do you need me to pick you up from the airport?
translation.ja: 明日 空港に 迎えに行こうか？

translation.en: I can't believe it's nearly Sunday already.
-I'll have to change my flight. -You can't.
-What about Aster? -You don't think I want to come home, Rob?
translation.ja: こんな状況で家に帰れない

translation.en: Yeah. God, of course. Yeah, sorry.
-Do… Do you need me to come over? -No, It's okay.
translation.ja: 僕が行こうか？ いえ 大丈夫

translation.en: All right. Just call if you need me, yeah?

translation.ja: ええ おやすみ おやすみ

translation.en: [Zain] I called and said I wanted to hire them for a private party.
translation.ja: 彼らに電話して 内輪のパーティーに誘った

translation.en: What if they don't know anything, or what if they won't tell us?
translation.ja: もし彼らが 何も話さなかったら？

translation.en: -Maybe we should go to the police. -No, I'll handle it.
translation.ja: 警察に行きましょ いや 俺に任せて

translation.en: I was on a semester abroad.
translation.ja: 私は短期留学中だった

translation.en: I met my husband Rob through her.
translation.ja: 彼女を通じて 夫のロブに会った

translation.en: We hit it off straight away.

translation.ja: いえ 私とケイトよ
お互い正反対の性格でね
でも すごく気が合った

translation.en: You know, right away, she's an extrovert.

translation.ja: 僕の妻は“カニーバ”と どういう意味？
調子がいいってことだ

translation.en: How did you meet your wife?
She was a doctor at the hospital where I was doing my nursing training?
translation.ja: 彼女は医者で 俺が看護実習中の病院にいた

translation.en: She believed me when I say I was a nice guy
and agreed to go out with me. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 彼女は誘いに乗ってくれた

translation.en: Is Mina okay with you helping me?
translation.ja: ミーナは私たちのこと 気にしない？
心配するな 任せて

translation.en: -The woman you were with Friday night. -Kate! What have you done with her?
translation.ja: 金曜の女だ ケイトに何を？

translation.en: -I have done nothing. -So why did you run just now?
translation.ja: 誤解だ じゃあ何で逃げた？

translation.en: -She hired us for a good time. That's all. -[Zain] Don't lie to me!
translation.ja: 彼女に雇われた ウソつくな

translation.en: -What's he saying? -[Zain] They took her handbag?
translation.ja: 彼は何て？ バッグを盗んだ

translation.en: When was the last time you saw her?
What'd you do with the bag? Answer!
Did you put something in my water at the bar?

translation.ja: 答えろ！ やってない！

translation.en: I don't need to drug women. Come on. Please let me go. Okay?
translation.ja: 薬は使わない もう放してくれ

translation.en: Please, I'll get you the bag. Okay? Please.
[in Croatian] I didn't know they were stolen!
-[Zain] You think you were drugged? -[Beth] I've never been that drunk before?
translation.ja: 薬を盛られた？ だから酩酊(めいてい)したのよ

translation.en: They got me a glass of water. They could've slipped something into it.
translation.ja: 彼らに渡された水に 何か入ってたんだわ

translation.en: What if they drugged Kate too, you know? So they could rob us.
translation.ja: ケイトにも飲ませて 盗みを働いた

translation.en: Why didn't they take your bag too?
translation.ja: 君のバッグは 盗まれなかった

translation.en: Well, she did hire them to have sex with you.
translation.ja: 君と彼らを寝させるためだ

translation.en: [Beth] No, no. She would never hurt me.
translation.ja: 違う ケイトは私を 傷つけたりしない
俺の名前は言わないで

translation.en: I don't want to get in trouble.
If they revoke my visa, I have no place else to go.
translation.ja: ビザが取り消されたら 行くあてがない

translation.en: Listen, I'm sorry for dragging you into all this.
translation.ja: こんなことに巻き込んで ごめんね

translation.en: You're not dragging me into anything.
Call me if you need me, okay?
And look, now I have proof. Something must have happened to her.
translation.ja: 証拠をつかんだ 彼女に何かあった

translation.en: Let's not jump to conclusions. Let's start with details.
translation.ja: 焦らずに まず話を聞かせて

translation.en: -Your friend's name, date of birth-- -No, I gave this to him already yesterday.
translation.ja: 友人の名前と… 昨日もう彼に伝えたわ

translation.en: -You didn't file it? -He told me to come back in 24 hours.
translation.ja: ないの？ 彼はまた戻れと

translation.en: I figured her friend was out partying.
translation.ja: 彼女の友人は パーティーしてた

translation.en: [scoffing] They brought two escorts back to their apartment.
translation.ja: エスコートを家に連れ込み

translation.en: They were drunk. Probably high on drugs.
translation.ja: 薬でハイだったんだろ

translation.en: No, I… I wasn't doing drugs. And… I didn't know they were escorts.
translation.ja: 私は飲まなかった それにエスコートだなんて 知らなかった

translation.en: Something bad has happened to her.
translation.ja: 彼女は事件に 巻き込まれたのよ

translation.en: [Kate] I don't think they're serial killers, Beth.
translation.ja: 彼らは連続殺人犯じゃない

translation.en: And even if they are, I don't know if I care. Look at them.
translation.ja: もしそうだとしても 私は気にしないけどね

translation.en: You need to interview these men.
they might have drugged me or maybe both of us.
translation.ja: 私たち２人とも 彼らに薬を飲まされた

translation.en: You just said you didn't do drugs.
translation.ja: 薬は飲まなかったんだろ

translation.en: I… I didn't do drugs. I was drugged.
translation.ja: 飲んだんじゃなく 飲まされた

translation.en: -There's a difference. -Funny you didn't mention it before.
translation.ja: 大きな違いよ さっきと違う

translation.en: 'Cause I wasn't sure. I'm still not.
translation.ja: 自分の記憶があいまいなの

translation.en: [in Croatian] Can you get her some water?
Then run these names through the system.
[in English] I'm sorry about my colleague.
translation.ja: 同僚に代わって謝るわ

translation.en: is it possible you may have been assaulted?
Well, when we're done here, we'll take you to the hospital
translation.ja: この後 あなたを病院に 連れていく

translation.en: for a drug test and a checkup.
And they admitted they stole it,
and then gave it back to you.
translation.ja: あなたにバッグを返した

translation.en: I explained Kate was missing, and I…
translation.ja: ケイトが失踪したと言った

translation.en: told them I wouldn't go to the police if they gave it back to me.
translation.ja: バッグを返せば 警察には行かないともね

translation.en: [nurse] Any signs of sexual assault are still inconclusive.
translation.ja: 性的暴行されたかどうかは まだ不明です

translation.en: We'll have those results and the results of the blood test within 24 hours.
translation.ja: 24時間以内に 血液検査の結果で分かります

translation.en: -[Jay] It's a classic Kate move. -Going missing?
translation.ja: いつものことだ 失踪よ

translation.en: Always has to be the center of attention.
translation.ja: ケイトは目立ちたがり屋だ

translation.en: She wore red on our wedding day, I mean,
translation.ja: ウエディングドレスは赤

translation.en: should've taken that as a warning of sharks in the water.
translation.ja: 警告色だ ギョッとしたよ

translation.en: You haven't talked to her then?
[Jay] No, not for weeks. It's been bliss.
translation.ja: 何週間もしてない 最高だよ

translation.en: -No, no, you talked to her Friday night. -No, I didn't.
translation.ja: 金曜の夜に話したでしょ？ いいや

translation.en: She said you called her about the credit card.
translation.ja: クレジットカードの話よ

translation.en: What credit card? All communication has to go through our lawyers.
translation.ja: 連絡はすべて 弁護士を通してる

translation.en: Look, Beth, I can actually guarantee this whole disappearance act
translation.ja: 俺が思うに こういう失踪行為は大体―

translation.en: is a lot of bollocks, all right.
What credit card by the way?
What? Are you saying she's… [scoffs] faking her disappearance?
translation.ja: 待って ケイトがわざと 失踪したと言うの？

translation.en: Why? Why would she do that?
Because drama is embedded in her DNA like an extra chromosome.
translation.ja: 生まれつき自作自演が 好きな奴なんだよ

translation.en: She once ran off to New York for a week after we had an argument
translation.ja: 俺とのケンカ後 ＮＹに逃げたことも

translation.en: with no word if she was dead or alive.
translation.ja: 無事すら知らせずにね

translation.en: All right, just trust me, she likes to punish people.
translation.ja: 人を苦しめるのが 好きな奴なんだよ

translation.en: Look, I gotta go. Just call me, and let me know what happens, all right?
translation.ja: 出かけるから また何かあれば連絡してくれ
何よ？ チェックアウトだ
友達はまだ行方不明か

translation.en: -Did you go to the police? -[Beth] Yeah, they're looking for her.
translation.ja: 警察に行った？ ええ 捜索中よ

translation.en: I'm staying till they find her.
translation.ja: 見つかるまで帰らない

translation.en: If your friend shows up, at least you will be close by.
translation.ja: 友達が戻ってきた時 すぐ分かる

translation.en: Uh, there should be towels in the bathroom, and…
translation.ja: バスルームにタオルが要るね

translation.en: just let me know if you need anything else.
translation.ja: 他に必要な物があれば言って

translation.en: I think you're gonna love it.
[on voicemail] You've reached Rob, leave me a message after the--
translation.ja: ロブです　留守電に伝言を…
あれは 収録スタジオ？

translation.en: I was about to order in.
Uh, I… I was about to go out actually.
translation.ja: ちょうど出かけるところなの
ハーイ ありがとう

translation.en: I had to get out of there.
Let's get some food before we start looking.
-I know a very good Syrian-- -[Rob] Beth.
Uh, what are you doing here?
I've been calling you all day to let you know I was on my way.
translation.ja: 来るまでに何度も電話した
心配した アスターは？
シッターに 一晩中？

translation.en: My parents are away. Remember? In the Dordogne. She'll be fine.
translation.ja: 僕の両親は今フランスだろ 心配ない

translation.en: -Sorry, am I interrupting something? -No. This is Zain.
translation.ja: 邪魔かな？ いいえ　ゼインよ

translation.en: He's a taxi driver. And he's been helping me look for Kate.
translation.ja: タクシー運転手で 一緒にケイトを捜してる

translation.en: Let me know if you hear anything.
translation.ja: 何か分かったら教えて
ええ ごめんね また

translation.en: Who the bloody hell is he? [chuckles]
-I just told you. He's the taxi driver. -Who you were going to dinner with.
translation.ja: タクシーの運転手よ 夕食の相手だ

translation.en: Give me a break. He's been helping me.
He… He drove me and Kate to a bar the night that she went missing--
translation.ja: 彼に送ってもらったあと ケイトは失踪したの…

translation.en: Beth, are you kidding? What if he's involved?
You were just about to get into a car with him.

translation.ja: バカげてる 真面目だ

translation.en: I didn't mean to upset you.
translation.ja: 怒らせるつもりはない

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me? I would've flown straight over.
translation.ja: 教えてくれたら 飛んできたのに

translation.en: I couldn't tell you over the phone.
Do the police think they're involved in her going missing?
translation.ja: 警察は彼らが絡んでると？

translation.en: They don't seem to have a clue. And they're barely lifting a finger to find her.
translation.ja: 手がかりはないし 警察も動かない

translation.en: [Rob] What if Jay's right, and she's messing with us?

translation.ja: 違う ケイトは そんな人じゃ…

translation.en: She likes to be the center of attention, yes, but she wouldn't do this to me.
translation.ja: 目立つのは好きだけど 私を困らせたりしない

translation.en: [man] She's been in the water for some time.
translation.ja: しばらく水面下にいた

translation.en: It's too soon to say. The autopsy will tell us more.
translation.ja: 検死を待たないと 何とも言えません

translation.en: But you think it was an accident? [sniffles] That she fell in?
translation.ja: でも彼女が事故で 水中に沈んだと思う？

translation.en: Or do you think she was killed?
We need to wait for the result of the autopsy.
translation.ja: 検死の結果を待ちましょう

translation.en: We'll be in touch when we know more.
I feel bad, you know, for finding her annoying.
translation.ja: 彼女を迷惑がったことを 後悔してる

translation.en: I have to get going soon. You sure you don't want to come with me?
translation.ja: もう帰るけど君は来ない？

translation.en: We talked about this. I have to…
stay till after the autopsy and…
translation.ja: 私はここで検死の結果を待つ

translation.en: -There's the arrangements to figure out. -Yeah. Sorry. Sorry.
translation.ja: もうすぐ分かる ああ　ごめん

translation.en: They can't tell if she was sexually assaulted given the state of the body.
translation.ja: 遺体の状態だけでは 性的暴行か分からないらしい

translation.en: And the fact she had sex with multiple partners
translation.ja: でも彼女が失踪する当日に

translation.en: on the night she went missing.
Can I have a minute? Please?
[on voicemail] You've reached Rob, leave me a message after the tone.
translation.ja: ロブです 留守電に伝言を 残してください
薬毒物検査の結果が出た

translation.en: It shows high levels of cocaine and ketamine in Kate's system.
translation.ja: 体内から高濃度のコカインと ケタミンが検出された

translation.en: Did you know she was taking drugs?
You'd already made a judgment about who she was.
translation.ja: 偏見を持ってたでしょ？

translation.en: I thought it would stop you looking for her, and it did.
translation.ja: もし事前に知れば 捜査をやめてた

translation.en: [Kovac] The results of your blood work came back too.
translation.ja: あなたの血液検査の 結果も出た

translation.en: They also found traces of ketamine.
See. I… I told you I was drugged.
translation.ja: 私は薬を飲まされたの

translation.en: [Kovac] We interviewed the two men you identified.
translation.ja: ２人の男性の 取り調べをした

translation.en: They deny giving you any illegal substances.
translation.ja: 彼らは容疑を否認したわ
否認するに決まってる

translation.en: And they also have alibis for the time of the murder.
translation.ja: それに事件当時の アリバイがある

translation.en: A taxi driver picked them up outside your apartment.
translation.ja: あなたの家にいた タクシー運転手と

translation.en: Their roommate can vouch for them too.
translation.ja: 彼らのルームメイトが証人よ

translation.en: She's divorcing him. Isn't that a motive?
translation.ja: 離婚中だから あやしい

translation.en: [Beth] It's only a two-hour flight from here.
We interviewed people from the Blue Parlour,
translation.ja: バーでの取り調べによると

translation.en: and several people saw you and Kate arguing when you left.
translation.ja: あなたとケイトは 口論したそうね

translation.en: You didn't argue with Kate then, hours before she died?
translation.ja: ケイトが亡くなる数時間前に 口論を？
どこの誰だかも分からない
ただの火遊びだってば

translation.en: I thought you didn't recall anything about that night.
translation.ja: あの夜の記憶はないでしょ

translation.en: I… I passed out in the taxi, but I remember some things.
translation.ja: タクシーの中で潰れたけど 多少は覚えてるわ

translation.en: You think I have something to do with Kate's murder?
translation.ja: 私がケイトを殺したと？

translation.en: Is there anything else you haven't told us?
translation.ja: 他に隠していることは？

translation.en: [officer] We need your passport until we can verify your statement.
translation.ja: 供述内容を確かめるまで パスポートは預かる

translation.en: If you remember anything, call me.
[in English] Let's hope your story checks out.
translation.ja: 君の話が正しいといいな
ジェイ　知ってたのね

translation.en: Look, I was going to, but, uh, you were about to have a baby.
translation.ja: 言おうと思ったけど 君は出産間近だった

translation.en: My husband was having an affair with my best friend,
translation.ja: 夫と親友が不倫してても

translation.en: and you didn't think I had the right to know.
translation.ja: 私には知る権利がないのね

translation.en: How long was it going on for?
I guess she was trying to get back at me. Tit for Tat.
You know they had a thing at Uni.
Yeah, yeah, a drunken one-night stand at freshman week.
translation.ja: ええ 新歓で酔って 一晩だけ寝た

translation.en: -What are you saying? -[Jay] I'm not saying anything.
translation.ja: だから何？ 何でもない

translation.en: maybe there were some latent feelings on her part.
translation.ja: ケイトは引きずってた

translation.en: [Beth] How could I have not seen it?
translation.ja: 見なかったことにしたい

translation.en: We don't see what we don't want to see.
translation.ja: 人は見たくないものは見ない

translation.en: I've been feeling so guilty for…
translation.ja: 後ろめたい気持ちで いっぱいなの
十分 感謝できてない
自分の人生にも アスターにもね

translation.en: to look up and see what was staring me in the face.
translation.ja: とても自分の顔を見られない

translation.en: What if she did drug me
so I would sleep with someone
translation.ja: 誰かと寝させるために

translation.en: or not know if I had or hadn't?
translation.ja: 私が寝たかも 分からないように

translation.en: Then she could get Rob to leave me.
translation.ja: そしたら彼女は 私からロブを奪える

translation.en: Do you think he could have killed Kate?
And I spoke to him over the weekend.
translation.ja: 週末 彼と電話で話した

translation.en: You never wondered if it was me?
Where I come from, we say Alalbek Daleelek.
translation.ja: “アルバック･ダレレック”と いう言葉が祖国にある
あなたの奥さんは 亡くなったの？

translation.en: She was working in a clinic.
translation.ja: 彼女は診療所で働いてた

translation.en: I was late to pick her up.
translation.ja: 俺は彼女の迎えに遅れた

translation.en: [Rob on phone] You there? Hello? Hi?
translation.ja: もしもし？　聞こえる？

translation.en: Hey, um, I was putting Aster down. Sorry, I got your message. You okay?
translation.ja: 寝かしてて メールに気づけなかった 大丈夫？
僕とケイト？ やめて

translation.en: Beth, what are you talking about?
That you were sleeping with her for months.
translation.ja: 彼女と何ヵ月も寝てた

translation.en: [chuckling nervously] Uh, what? What you talking about?
Stop treating me like an idiot. I found the text messages on her phone.
translation.ja: バカにしないで 彼女の携帯でメールを見た

translation.en: I don't know what to say. I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 何て言えばいいか　ごめん

translation.en: I only did it because we… When was the last time we had sex?
translation.ja: 僕たちずっと セックスしてなかった

translation.en: -You were depressed and I-- -No! You do not get to blame this on me.
translation.ja: 君は拒み… やめて　私のせいにしないで

translation.en: -No, I'm not blam… Look, I'm sorry-- -[Beth] Stop apologizing!
translation.ja: 君のせいじゃ…　ごめん 謝らないで！

translation.en: Look, you've just got to come home. We can't do this over the phone.
translation.ja: 電話じゃ話せないから 家に帰ってきて

translation.en: because the police have taken my passport because I'm sure they think I killed Kate.
translation.ja: 警察にパスポートを 押収されてる 容疑者扱いされてる

translation.en: And if they find out about the affair, they'll have a damn good reason too.
translation.ja: この不倫問題がバレたら 疑いが強まる

translation.en: -I am so sorry. -[Beth] Just shut up.
translation.ja: ベス...　すまない もう黙って

translation.en: [sniffling] I just want to see Aster.
Beth Jenner, we're arresting you on suspicion of the murder of Kate Thompson.
translation.ja: ベス･ジェナー ケイト殺害容疑で逮捕する

translation.en: [officer] Put your hands behind your back.
For how long have you known Mr. Zakaria?
translation.ja: ザカリアさんと いつ知り合った？

translation.en: How did the two of you meet?

translation.ja: 彼はタクシー運転手よ

translation.en: He took me and Kate to the bar on Friday night.
translation.ja: ケイトと私を バーまで乗せてくれた

translation.en: He's been helping me look for her.
translation.ja: ケイトを捜してくれた

translation.en: Why didn't you tell us he was with you when you confronted the escorts?
translation.ja: なぜ彼のことを黙ってたの？

translation.en: Or that he physically assaulted one of them?
translation.ja: エスコートを 暴行したんだろ？

translation.en: He got them to admit it. He got the bag back.
translation.ja: ケイトのバッグを 取り返してくれた

translation.en: Mr. Zakaria is connected to organized crime.
translation.ja: ザカリアさんは 組織犯罪に関与してる

translation.en: He's a member of an Albanian gang
translation.ja: アルバニア系の 暴力団の一員で

translation.en: involved in human trafficking, among other things.
translation.ja: 人身売買に手を染めてる

translation.en: You didn't know this about him?
No. No, of course not. What… What are you saying?
translation.ja: 知らないに決まってるでしょ 一体何の話？

translation.en: [in English] And you hired him to do it.
This is insane! This is insane!
translation.ja: こんなの おかしいわ

translation.en: How do you… You can't possibly think I had anything to do with this!
translation.ja: 私が関与してるわけ ないでしょ

translation.en: Please! Why would I want Kate dead?
Because she was having an affair with your husband.
translation.ja: 彼女はあなたの夫と 不倫してた

translation.en: You didn't think we'd find out.

translation.ja: 私は昨日知ったばかりよ

translation.en: Jay has known about it for months.
translation.ja: 彼は数ヵ月前から知ってた

translation.en: We are speaking to him later today.
translation.ja: 彼とは このあと話す

translation.en: Just because they haven't charged you doesn't mean they won't.
translation.ja: 警察はあなたを 起訴しようとしてる

translation.en: It is only because they don't have enough evidence yet.
They were hoping they could press you on your connection to Mr. Zacharia,
translation.ja: あなたとザカリアさんの 関係をこじつけ

translation.en: Call me next time before you say anything to incriminate yourself.
translation.ja: 不利な発言をしないよう 何か言う前に私に連絡して
家主に入れてもらった

translation.en: They told me you'd been arrested.
translation.ja: 逮捕されたんじゃないの？

translation.en: I was driving all Friday night until Saturday morning.
translation.ja: 俺は金曜の夜から 土曜の朝まで運転してた

translation.en: you have links to an Albanian criminal gang.
translation.ja: あなたは暴力団の一員だと 言ってた

translation.en: I don't know who to believe.
translation.ja: 誰を信じればいいのか

translation.en: I saved the life of a boy who'd been hit with shrapnel in the leg.
translation.ja: 俺は足に爆弾の金属片が 刺さった少年を助けた

translation.en: His father has connections to an Albanian people-smuggling ring.
translation.ja: 彼の父親はアルバニアの 人身売買集団にいた

translation.en: He got me out of Aleppo, crossed the border into Turkey then here.
translation.ja: 彼のおかげで俺は― トルコの国境を越え ここへ来た

translation.en: So you don't work for this person?
How do I know you're telling me the truth?
[in Arabic] Your heart is your guide.
[Beth] You can't possibly think I had anything to do with this.
translation.ja: 私が関与してるわけ ないでしょ

translation.en: Why would I want Kate dead?
Because she was having an affair with your husband.
translation.ja: あなたの夫と 不倫してたからよ

translation.en: My husband was having an affair with my best friend.
translation.ja: 夫と親友が不倫してても

translation.en: You didn't think I had the right to know?
translation.ja: 私に知る権利がないの？

translation.en: Uh, my cell data ran out.
Could I get the Wi-Fi password?
[Sebastian] What happened with the police? They let you go.
translation.ja: 警察から釈放されたの？

translation.en: [Sebastian] And how much longer do you think you'll be staying here?
translation.ja: いつまで ここにいる？

translation.en: A screening for a movie I supervised the music for.
translation.ja: 映画の仕事がある 音響部門の監督なんだ
全部 撮ってるのね
〝ライブビュー〞 金曜は撮った？

translation.en: Come on, come on, come on.
-Well, thanks. Are you sure? -[Kate] Yeah, no, for sure. Come on.
translation.ja: ありがとう　本当？ どうかしら　来て

translation.en: -[Mateo] Here we go. -[Kate] Watch your step.

translation.ja: 足元には気をつけてる

translation.en: Somebody's gonna have a beautiful night of sleep.
Let's get you ready for bed. Yeah. Whoa.

translation.ja: バルコニーにバスタブがある

translation.en: -[Beth] No! -No! Stop! It's not what you think!
translation.ja: イヤ！ 待ってくれ　誤解だ

translation.en: You're taping people in the shower having sex!
translation.ja: お風呂場のセックスを 撮ってる

translation.en: And you knew what happened to Kate this whole time. You could have told the police.
translation.ja: ケイトに起きたことを 警察に話せたはず

translation.en: You told them about my husband's affair, didn't you?
translation.ja: 何で私の夫の不倫の話を 言うのよ？

translation.en: What is that? No. Don't delete them.
translation.ja: ダメよ　データを消さないで

translation.en: [Sebastian] Stop, you don't understand! Stop. I can explain.
translation.ja: 待ってくれ　誤解だ 話を聞いて

translation.en: He… He deleted all the videos.
translation.ja: 彼は動画を全部消した

translation.en: He's gonna tell the police I attacked him.
translation.ja: 私に殴られたと言うわ

translation.en: Oh my God, this is a nightmare.
translation.ja: どうしよう　悪夢よ

translation.en: We'll find out where Kate went, then we can hopefully find out who brought her home.
translation.ja: ケイトの行き先と 彼女を家に送った奴を探そう

translation.en: Then we can go to the police. We will explain. It will be okay.
translation.ja: そのことを警察に 伝えればいい

translation.en: I gave him the license number.
translation.ja: 彼に車の番号を渡した
のど アソコ 両目

translation.en: Okay, I'll remember that for next time.
translation.ja: 今後のために覚えておく

translation.en: They say you're a suspect in Kate's murder.
translation.ja: 警察は君を犯人扱いしてる

translation.en: You picked up a woman early Saturday morning around 3:00.
translation.ja: 土曜の朝３時頃に 女の人を乗せたでしょ

translation.en: -She's my height, blonde hair. -[Zain] On Jerina Street.
translation.ja: 私くらいの身長で金髪よ ああ
〈彼女をどこへ 連れていった？〉

translation.en: We just need to know where you took her. That's all.
translation.ja: 〈彼女が向かった先を 知りたい〉

translation.en: She made me follow these two men. She said they stole her bag.
translation.ja: 〈彼女のバッグを 盗んだ奴らを追いかけた〉

translation.en: I lost them on a one-way street.
[in English] What's he saying? Where'd you take her?
translation.ja: 彼は何て？　行き先は？

translation.en: [Beth] If Kate reported her bag stolen,
why wasn't there a record of it when I reported her missing?
translation.ja: なぜ私が行った時なかった？

translation.en: Pavic didn't file my report either.
translation.ja: パビッチは私の記録も 漏らした

translation.en: We need to get out of here.
[Kovac] Beth! Don't leave! We just want to talk.
I saw the sticker in the security footage.
translation.ja: 監視カメラに映ってた

translation.en: He must've driven Kate home after she reported her bag stolen.
translation.ja: 彼はケイトを 家まで送ったのね

translation.en: Oh my God. Oh my God. Oh my God.
translation.ja: 大変よ　どうしよう

translation.en: It was him. It was him.
-Make her meet you. -[Beth] Wait. Where are you going?
translation.ja: 話をして どこ行くの？

translation.en: Believe me it's him. It's the cop who did it.
-[Kovac] What're you talking about? -[Zain] We saw the footage.
translation.ja: 何言ってるの？ 映像を見た

translation.en: [Beth] You hit on her, didn't you?
My God, you did! You hit on her, and she rejected you!
translation.ja: ケイトがあなたを フッたからでしょ

translation.en: That's what men call women who won't sleep with them!
translation.ja: フラれた相手をそう呼ぶ
黙れ！ イヤよ　やめて
監視カメラの映像を入手した

translation.en: And we recovered some of your landlord's footage.
translation.ja: あと家主が撮ってた 映像の一部を復元した

translation.en: I'm so sorry I doubted you. You were right.
translation.ja: あなたを疑って ごめんなさい

translation.en: Pavic drove Kate home after she reported her bag stolen.
translation.ja: パビッチはケイトを 家まで送り届けた

translation.en: We think he did make a pass at her.
translation.ja: 彼女に言い寄ったんでしょう
彼がケイトを殺したのね
検視解剖の結果を見るに

translation.en: we can safely assume Pavic hit her over the back of the head,
translation.ja: パビッチが彼女の後頭部を 殴ったんでしょう パビッチが彼女の後頭部を 殴ったんでしょう 〝死亡診断書〞 パビッチが彼女の後頭部を 殴ったんでしょう

translation.en: and then dumped her body in the harbor
translation.ja: 〝脊椎骨折　頭部外傷〞 そして彼女を港に捨てた そして彼女を港に捨てた そして彼女を港に捨てた 〝溺死 鈍器損傷 頭部外傷〞
〝溺死 鈍器損傷 頭部外傷〞 まだ息があった
彼は風紀犯罪課にいた

translation.en: he arrested for sex work claimed he assaulted them.
translation.ja: 彼に暴行されたと主張したわ
内務調査室が調べたけど

translation.en: but the women all withdrew their statements.
translation.ja: 彼女たちは皆 被害届を取り下げたの

translation.en: so unfortunately, they moved him over to the tourist division.
translation.ja: 彼を観光課に移動させるしか できなかったわ

translation.en: I ordered a search warrant on Luka and Mateo's apartment and workplace too.
translation.ja: ルカやマテオの家や職場を 捜索したわ

translation.en: They've been drugging the women who hired them then robbing them.
translation.ja: 彼らは客に薬を飲ませ 強盗してたの

translation.en: but the cocaine in her system counteracted it.
translation.ja: でも体内のコカインが 毒性を和らげた

translation.en: So I'm free to go then.
In case you want to press charges against your landlord.
translation.ja: 家主を告訴したい時の ためにね

translation.en: Uh, I just put the kettle on. Do you want to stay for a cuppa?
translation.ja: お湯を沸かす お茶でも飲む？

translation.en: Uh, I packed clothes and Ernie the sheep in the bag.
translation.ja: 服と羊のアーニーを 持ってきた

translation.en: I… I didn't bring diapers. I figured you had those.
translation.ja: おむつは ここに 何枚かあったわね

translation.en: I can pop out and get some. No worries.
translation.ja: すぐ買ってくる　心配ない

translation.en: Hey, there's this kids' art thing at the park tomorrow.
translation.ja: 明日は公園で子供向けの 芸術イベントがある

translation.en: I was thinking of taking Aster if you fancy joining us.
translation.ja: よければ君とアスターと 行きたい

translation.en: Maybe we could have lunch after at Georgio's, the three of us.
translation.ja: そのあと３人で ランチに行こう

translation.en: You know, uh, I think you might have my spare car key.
translation.ja: 私の車のスペアキーを ちょうだい

translation.en: Yeah, it's probably in the bowl in the hallway
translation.ja: 確か廊下にある 鍵置き用のトレーの中か

translation.en: Oh my God, I'm so sorry.
I can't find Ernie the sheep.
Where did you say it was?
It's… It's in the bag. I'll… I'll get it.
translation.ja: カバンの中よ　私が取る

translation.en: I'm gonna stay for that cup of tea.
If that's, uh, still up for offer.

translation.ja: ほら ここよ どうも

translation.en: Suppose you've got a lot to do before you start work on Monday.
translation.ja: 君は月曜から仕事だね

translation.en: Did you get the child-minding sorted?
You're looking at me strangely. Do you…
translation.ja: 変な目で見て どうしたんだ
何て？ パビッチじゃなかった

translation.en: Is this some kind of joke?

translation.ja: あなたは金曜の夜に 飛行機で来た

translation.en: You flew back Saturday morning. Won't be hard to check the flights.
translation.ja: 土曜の朝に 戻ったのは分かってる

translation.en: Beth, come on. You can't be serious.
translation.ja: ベス 冗談はよしてくれ

translation.en: It's from her necklace, and I found it in your jacket.
translation.ja: 彼女のネックレスのパーツが あなたの服に

translation.en: I can explain. It was an accident.
-What did you do? -Stop. Wait. Listen to me. Listen to me.
translation.ja: 一体何を？ 待って　聞いてくれ

translation.en: And I was waiting outside the apartment.
translation.ja: 家の外で待ってたんだ

translation.en: I'd been calling and texting. She wasn't picking up. I thought…
translation.ja: 彼女に連絡しても 返事がなくて

translation.en: I was terrified she told you.
She kept threatening to. I thought if she had, I could at least talk to you.
translation.ja: 彼女に脅され続けたけど 君と話したかった

translation.en: I was about to leave, but then she showed up.
translation.ja: 帰るところ彼女が来た

translation.en: Jesus. What the hell are you doing here?
translation.ja: ウソ　何でここにいるの？

translation.en: You know this makes you a stalker.
I didn't have a choice. You wouldn't answer your phone.
Let's go. Come on. Come on.
We ended up down by the water, and we talked.
translation.ja: 水辺に着いて話したんだ

translation.en: You're gonna ruin her life. You wanna do that? I don't.
translation.ja: 彼女の人生を 壊したくないだろ？

translation.en: we're doing this. You and me.
How many times? It meant nothing.
translation.ja: 何の意味もない関係よ

translation.en: How can you say it meant nothing?
Why were we doing it if it meant nothing?
translation.ja: この瞬間も意味ないのか？

translation.en: I know. You have feelings for me.
translation.ja: 君は僕を愛してるだろ

translation.en: She told me… She told me she was in love with me.
She, she, she… She kept begging me.
translation.ja: そして僕にすがりついてきた

translation.en: She was begging me to leave you.
translation.ja: 別れたくないと言ってね

translation.en: She said you were unhappy. I'd be doing you a favor breaking up with you.
I told her, I don't know how many times, that was never gonna happen.
translation.ja: 僕は何度も止めたけどね

translation.en: What happened between us was a mistake.
It was the biggest mistake of my life?
[Kate] It was a rebound fling, and you…
[sighs] …were in the right place at the right time.
translation.ja: その時 偶然 あなたがいただけよ

translation.en: Actually, from now on, I'm only telling the truth.
translation.ja: 私はこれから真実だけを話す

translation.en: -Maybe you should try it too. -[Rob] Please, please, Kate, please.
translation.ja: あなたもね 待ってくれ　ケイト
彼女に言うな 離して

translation.en: -Stop it! Get off me! -No, stop, listen to me!
She tripped and fell and banged her head.
I didn't mean to hurt her.
translation.ja: わざとじゃなかったんだ

translation.en: No. No, I… I thought she was dead.
translation.ja: いや　死んだと思った

translation.en: -No, you didn't. -[Rob] That's why I left her.
You're lying. I saw the autopsy report. She drowned.
translation.ja: 検視報告書には溺死だと

translation.en: -She was alive in the water when you left. -I'm telling the truth.
translation.ja: 彼女はまだ生きてたのよ

translation.en: -You have to listen. -No, I don't have to listen!
translation.ja: 聞け いえ あなたの話なんか 聞かない

translation.en: I will never listen to you again. I should've listened to Kate.
translation.ja: いえ あなたの話なんか 聞かない 彼女は正しかった

translation.en: That's what the weekend was about.
She wanted to remind me who I was before I met you.
translation.ja: 彼女は私に伝えようとしてた

translation.en: -What are you gonna do now, huh? -You killed my best friend.
translation.ja: どうする気だ？ 親友を殺した

translation.en: You're not gonna tell the police, are you?
What would be the point? The case's closed. That cop's dead.
translation.ja: あの警官が死んで 一件落着した

translation.en: What good is me going to jail? Beth?
translation.ja: 俺が刑務所に行って いいのか？

translation.en: Please, I'm begging you. I'm begging you.
You want her to grow up without a dad?
translation.ja: 父親のいない子になる

translation.en: Come on, you know I'm not.
No. You are not calling the police.
I got it all. The police are on their way. Beth?
translation.ja: 状況は分かった 警察が向かってる

translation.en: [Beth] It's okay. Mama's got you. Mama's got you.
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ ママがついてるからね

translation.en: ♪ When you came to me every night ♪
translation.ja: 日本語字幕　小畑 愛沙子
